events.event: Heavy rains in Côte d'Ivoire disrupt harvest
Black pod disease outbreak reported in Ghana
Red Sea tensions increase freight rates

news.headline: Cocoa Prices Surge as Heavy Rains Disrupt West African Harvest
news.summary: London cocoa futures jumped to $3,844/tonne as torrential rains in Côte d'Ivoire hampered harvesting operations.

news.headline: Cocoa Hits 2-Year High on Supply Concerns
news.summary: New York cocoa futures reached $4,458/tonne, up 27% from October, as disease outbreaks compound weather woes.

news.headline: Global Cocoa Deficit Deepens as Floods Delay Mid-Crop
news.summary: ICCO reports second consecutive year of production deficit as floods make roads impassable in key growing regions.

news.headline: Cocoa Rally Shows No Signs of Slowing in New Year
news.summary: Prices continue upward trajectory with 46% annual gain in London futures as supply constraints persist.
